markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expand Spiral](/Feats.aspx?ID=3473) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 27</row>

**Archetype** [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173)

**Prerequisites**
[Spiral Sworn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3470)

</column>

---

Your prayers encompass your companions, granting you the ability to share [Pharasma's](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) blessings. When you use Spiral Sworn, you can spend 2 actions instead of 1 to grant the benefits to all allies who are in the light of your spiral when you take the action.
name: Expand Spiral

summary_markdown: Your prayers encompass your companions, granting you the ability to share [Pharasma's](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) blessings.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Expand Spiral Source Book of the Dead pg. 27 Archetype Soul Warden Prerequisites Spiral Sworn --- Your prayers encompass your companions, granting you the ability to share Pharasma's blessings. When you use Spiral Sworn, you can spend 2 actions instead of 1 to grant the benefits to all allies who are in the light of your spiral when you take the action.
